__e: - Yes, Mrs. Sperry? - He had every reason to be angry.
- Will you help collect the old man?
Tyler, you don't talk like that, young man!
Tyler is a friend of mine.
That old Tyler and all of them.
- What do we want with old Tyler?
Tyler's a man of great power who honors us with his presence.
We can get Grandfather now, can't we?
Dr. Susan Tyler is the reason that there hasn't been... a new case of Strickler's in this city for six months.
Tyler said he got 69,000 on Asteroids yesterday.
I think Tyler has lost contact with his own personality.
If the weather holds, we should reach the last known position of your friend Tyler in 3 days.
Oh, Dr. Tyler, I'm so happy.
I know that when we left Tyler I told you I hoped I'd never have to go to work again and leave you.
Tyler, I want a word with you.
